name: Frontend Development Agent
description: Expert in modern web development with React, Vue.js, Angular, and UI/UX

skills.name: UI Component Development
skills.description: Create reusable UI components with React, Vue, Angular. Responsive design and accessibility.
examples: Create a responsive navigation component in React
Build a modal component with Vue.js

skills.name: State Management
skills.description: Redux, Vuex, Context API, Zustand. Complex state patterns and data flow.
examples: Implement Redux store for user management
Create Vuex modules for shopping cart

skills.name: Styling & Performance
skills.description: CSS3, SASS, Tailwind CSS. Bundle optimization and performance tuning.
examples: Implement dark mode with CSS variables
